gen:link.msg:message: Reported value of `LiabilitiesNoncurrent` at end of period SHOULD be equal to sum of reported value of `LiabilitiesNoncurrent` at beginning of period and changes in that value during period, `LiabilitiesNoncurrentMovement`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_LiabilitiesNoncurrentEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_LiabilitiesNoncurrentEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_LiabilitiesNoncurrentStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_LiabilitiesNoncurrentStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_LiabilitiesNoncurrentMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_LiabilitiesNoncurrentMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`LiabilitiesNoncurrentMember` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying children members. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`LiabilitiesNoncurrentMember` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying children members. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`LiabilitiesNoncurrentMovement` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_LiabilitiesNoncurrentMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_LiabilitiesNoncurrentMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfLiabilitiesNoncurrentMovementCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfLiabilitiesNoncurrentMovementCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfLiabilitiesNoncurrentMovementDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfLiabilitiesNoncurrentMovementDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`LiabilitiesNoncurrent` SHOULD be equal to + `LiabilitiesMaturityLessThanOneYear` + `LiabilitiesMaturityExceedingOneYearWithinFiveYears` + `LiabilitiesMaturityExceedingFiveYears`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST103Variables1E1_Filter00LiabilitiesNoncurrent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST103Variables1E1_Filter00LiabilitiesNoncurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST103Variables1E1_Filter01LiabilitiesMaturityLessThanOneYear')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST103Variables1E1_Filter01LiabilitiesMaturityLessThanOneYear return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST103Variables1E1_Filter02LiabilitiesMaturityExceedingOneYearWithinFiveYears')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST103Variables1E1_Filter02LiabilitiesMaturityExceedingOneYearWithinFiveYears return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST103Variables1E1_Filter03LiabilitiesMaturityExceedingFiveYears')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST103Variables1E1_Filter03LiabilitiesMaturityExceedingFiveYears return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`LiabilitiesNoncurrent` reported with `LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis` and `LiabilitiesFromRealEstateSoldSubjectTermsConditionsMember` SHOULD be equal to `LiabilitiesFromRealEstateSoldSubjectTermsConditions` without `LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis` and LiabilitiesFromRealEstateSoldSubjectTermsConditionsMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit6_Set02LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit6_Set02LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit6_Set01LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit6_Set01LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`LiabilitiesNoncurrent` reported with `LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis` and `LiabilitiesNoncurrentMember` SHOULD be equal to `LiabilitiesNoncurrent` without `LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis` and LiabilitiesNoncurrentMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set02LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set02LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set01LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set01LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`LiabilitiesNoncurrent` reported with `LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis` and `PayablesCreditInstitutionsNoncurrentMember` SHOULD be equal to `PayablesCreditInstitutionsNoncurrent` without `LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis` and PayablesCreditInstitutionsNoncurrentMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit3_Set02LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit3_Set02LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit3_Set01LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit3_Set01LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`LiabilitiesNoncurrent` reported with `LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis` and `PayablesGovernmentNoncurrentMember` SHOULD be equal to `PayablesGovernmentNoncurrent` without `LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis` and PayablesGovernmentNoncurrentMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit2_Set02LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit2_Set02LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit2_Set01LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit2_Set01LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`LiabilitiesNoncurrent` reported with `LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis` and `PayablesOtherNoncurrentMember` SHOULD be equal to `PayablesOtherNoncurrent` without `LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis` and PayablesOtherNoncurrentMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit7_Set02LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit7_Set02LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit7_Set01LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit7_Set01LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`LiabilitiesNoncurrent` reported with `LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis` and `PayablesShareholdersParticipatingInterestsNoncurrentMember` SHOULD be equal to `PayablesShareholdersParticipatingInterestsNoncurrent` without `LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis` and PayablesShareholdersParticipatingInterestsNoncurrentMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit5_Set02LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit5_Set02LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit5_Set01LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit5_Set01LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
